actions.name: Skywalker
actions.description: Effect: The user gains the resistances and immunities of the Flying-Type (but not the type itself, so the user does not receive STAB on Flying attacks, nor the weaknesses of the Flying-Type).

actions.name: Skywalker
actions.description: Passive: The user gains a Flight Score of 2, or increases their Flight Score by 40%, minimum 2.

system.description: Effect: The user gains the resistances and immunities of the Flying-Type (but not the type itself, so the user does not receive STAB on Flying attacks, nor the weaknesses of the Flying-Type). Passive: The user gains a Flight Score of 2, or increases their Flight Score by 40%, minimum 2.
